title: Autonomous Driving Multi-Tasking and Transfer Learning Practitioner Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of deep learning concepts, foundational Python programming skills
context.additional_context: Curriculum enabling smartphone-based practical training for current practitioners, prioritizing the production of project deliverables.

learning_goals: Learners can design and experiment with an LSTM-CNN hybrid model architecture for multi-task learning.
Transfer learning techniques can be applied in practice for the implementation of new scenarios
Model performance can be measured based on evaluation metrics for autonomous driving tasks (lane keeping, obstacle avoidance, etc.)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
